name: 13th Edition Spellbook
effect:
Cursed
This character has +2 levels for casting spells.
After casting a spell, this character succeed with a magic save (DC 15 + level of spell) or suffer a wound.
Now bundled with crystal ball media player and future event browsing.

name: A Common Purpose
effect: React: Before rolling initiative: You may target teammates' characters this turn as if they were in your army.
"We're being used. Fighting each other only serves our enemy." - Squire Orban

name: A Prophecy Fulfilled
effect:
Warlord only.
Spend Order: If this character has an Eastern Territory, a Western Territory, a Northern Territory, and a Southern Territory attached, you win the game.
"In the end, the Deverenians seized the four temples, and unleashed a new power on the world: the Ironhall refugees." - The Loremaster

name: Abd al-Jalaar
effect:
Deverenian • Monk
React: After Abd al-Jalaar enters play, kill one of your characters of a level equal to or greater than Abd al-Jalaar's: Move Abd al-Jalaar to your front rank.

name: Advice
effect:
You can have up to six copys of Advice in your deck.
May only be played by John Zinzer.
Order: Ask for advice from one person around you. Draw a card.
Order: Perform two +5 melee strikes.

name: Ahdi Akkhar
effect:
Dwarf • Warlord • Barbarian • Unique
Your Barbarian Dwarves have Powerattack +10.
React: Once per turn, after an attack in which one of your Dwarves kills an opposing character: One of your Barbarians performs an attack (spending as normal).

name: Al'drich von Grossynkiir
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon Lord • Overlord • Unique
Begins the game with one Dragon in rank 3 and one in rank 4.
May bring dragons into play 3 ranks below their printed level.

name: Alex Venator
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Barbarian • Druid • Ranger
Alex is both a cleric and a fighter.
Alex may equip any number and class of Familiars.
Alex may begin the game with Aquila and Fenrir equipped.
Alex cannot be killed, stunned, or have his items desroyed by opposing card effects.
React: Once per turn, after killing an opposing character: Search your deck for an action card with the Barbarian, Druid, or Ranger trait printed in its textbox and add it to your hand.

name: Altus Darkhart
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon Lord • Overlord • Assassin • Stealth +6
Your Dragons are non-Unique Mercenaries with Stealth +0 and may enter play adjacent to Altus if he is unstunned, even if he is in an opposing formation.
React: After an adjacent Dragon moves: Move Altus adjacent to the dragon.

name: Ambushed in the Snow
effect:
Fighter and rogue only.
Order: Target a stunned character up to 2 ranks away. This character may immediately attack without spending, with all strikes targeting the stunned character.

name: Amulet of Bymynn
effect:
Magic Resistance +0
Taliesin may start with this item equipped.
Characters in your army have +1 ATK, AC, Skill, and HP for each action card attached to this character.
Actions performed by this character may not be cancelled or redirected.
Order: Spend Amulet of Bymynn: Target character gains the Astral or Ethereal trait until end of turn.

name: Anathem
effect:
Weapon • Riposte +5
Anathem may not be targeted by opposing characters while equipped to Irad.
React: After one of your characters dies: Return the character to play in the same location ready with the Ethereal trait. Remove him from the game the next time he dies.

name: Ancient Oath Cohort
effect:
Mercenary • Epic • Cohort • Paladin
If Sir James Reed is your Warlord, your Cohorts have +1 HP and cannot be killed by card effects.
React: After a character rolls a Critical Success or Critical Failure: Move forward or backward one rank.

name: Annals of Triumph
effect:
Unique • Defend +0 • Marksmanship +0 • Medicine +0 • Riding +0 • Riposte +0 • Scribe +0 • Stealth +0
This character has +5 Skill and +1 HP.
"I just bookmark the useful pages." - Black Tom of Corinth

name: Anselm Beaucourt
effect:
Mercenary
While performing a melee strike against an evil character, Anselm gains +3 ATK.
"I require no payment, general. Justice is reward enough."

name: Aquamarine Earring
effect: Treasure • 1200 gp

name: Aquila
effect:
Familiar
This character does not spend to perform cleric action cards.
Order: Once per turn, perform a +9 ranged strike.
Order: Spend Aquila and target an action card in your discard pile with the Druid trait printed in its textbox: Return that card to your hand.

name: Arcane Qor-Teth
effect:
Mercenary • Overlord • Abyssal • Monster • Astral
Arcane Qor-Teth may cast wizard spells.
Once per turn, Arcane Qor-Teth may perform an action card in the discard pile as though it were in your hand.
Order: Once per turn: Move target Abyssal forward one rank.

name: Archos Loth
effect:
Deverenian • Necromancer • Paladin
Archos is both a wizard and a fighter.
Starts the game with Corruption equipped.
Order: Once per turn: Permanently take control of target non-Warlord character.
Order: Kill a character you control: Inflict a wound on each character in the rank that character was in.

name: Armlet of the Glade
effect:
Treasure • 3000 gp
Order: Destroy Armlet of the Glade: This character gains +2 ATK until end of turn.
The Nymph's jewelry enhances their beauty even more.

name: Around the World in 1 Night
effect: Order: Ready Christophe Kringle.
What to my Narawat eyes should appear? A chariot sleigh and four demonic reindeer.

name: Artax
effect:
Mercenary • Unique
React: Before Artax casts a spell which inflicts wounds on or kills himself, discard an equipped Henchman: Artax is not killed and does not suffer wounds. If the wounds or death were a cost of the spell, the cost is still considered paid.

name: Athanaen Hammer
effect:
Weapon • Unique • Scribe +5
React: Before a character within one rank suffers more than 1 wound, spend the Hammer: Reduce the wounds to 0.

name: Athanaes Falls
effect:
Unique
Spend Order: If characters in your army have used a cleric action, a fighter action, a rogue action, and a wizard action this turn (4 separate cards), attach Athanaes Falls to your Warlord.
While Athanaes Falls is attached, your characters have +5 ATK, +5 AC, +5 skill, and +2 hit points.

name: Atu the Fallen
effect:
Elf/Free Kingdoms • Medusan Lord • Druid • Undead
Your Monsters and Undead inflict an additional wound against stunned characters.
React: Once per target per turn, after a target character within two ranks performs an action: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or become stunned.

name: Atu, the Poisoned Field
effect:
Mercenary • Medusan Lord • Druid
You play cards ignoring class restrictions and loyalty penalties.
Opponents play with their hands revealed.
You may play opposing players' cards as though they were your own.
Black Tom has +1 hand size while facing Atu, the Poisoned Field.
"I remain as pure as the lands, but now my voice speaks on her behalf."

name: Aura of Power
effect:
Paladin only.
Spend Order: All Paladins in your army gain an ATK bonus equal to this Paladin's highest ATK bonus.

PM-P  (Steven Belledin)
"And if Terak manages to sway the Black Sun?" Bhaine asked.
"It matters not," replied Blackthorn. "My aide simply takes charge all the sooner."

name: Avatar of the Storm
effect:
Deverenian • Unique • Avatar • Astral
You may only put Avatar of the Storm into play if an Astral Deverenian has been killed this turn, or you spend an Astral Deverenian character to bring this character into play.
If the Avatar kills the highest level character in an opponent's first rank or is killed, shuffle the Avatar into your deck.

name: Avinaar Esmirik
effect:
Mercenary • Medusan Lord
Begins the game with Blade of Torment and Mark of Siret equipped.
Avinaar may not be spent or stunned by opponents' actions.
Kara Wadreth has +2 HP while opposing Avinaar.

name: Avinoam Blightlifter
effect:
Dwarf • Seer • Unique
React: Before a Dwarf within one rank suffers wounds, discard a card: If Avinoam is ready, reduce the wounds by one.

name: Axe of Tergoth (Treasure)
effect:
Weapon • Treasure • 3600 gp
This fighter has an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks.
"You see how the runes glow red? Only a very few of these have been forged."

name: Baphuma'al
effect:
Mercenary • Overlord • Seer • Necromancer
Baphuma'al is a cleric and a wizard.
Baphuma'al enters play as if he were level 9.

name: Baraz
effect:
Mercenary • Scout • Marksmanship +6 • Stealth +6
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
React: Once per turn, after target character pays the cost of an action to draw or retrieve card(s) from the deck: Perform a +5 ranged strike against the target.

name: Barrow Wight
effect:
Mercenary • Undead
While Barrow Wight is in your discard pile, your Warlord has the text: "Order: Once per turn: Barrow Wight performs a melee strike as if it were in your front rank. If the strike misses, remove it from the game."

name: Baruuk al-Semmeya
effect:
Deverenian • Medusan Lord • Assassin
Baruuk is a fighter and rogue, and starts with One Hundred Poisons and Zaina's Band equipped.
His items may not be targeted by opposing characters.
Order: Kill a character: Target non-Warlord character must succeed with a will save (DC 20) or ready, gain Stealth +10, and is under your control permanently.

name: Baruuk's Band
effect:
Scribe +0
This character may not be killed or moved by opposing card effects.
When Baruuk al-Semmeya dies his army remains in play but cannot perform actions until the end of turn. At end of turn if Baruuk al-Semmeya is not in play, he returns to play in the first rank of his army with One Hundred Poisons and Zaina's Band equipped.

name: Bascarite Ring
effect:
Unique • Magic Resistance +0
React: After this character succeeds with a Magic Resistance check, spend the Bascarite Ring to immediately cast the canceled spell (If this character could normally cast it) as if it were cast from your hand.

name: Bascarite Vermin
effect:
Mercenary
Bascarite Vermin may not equip items. You may have more than 3 copies of Bascarite Vermin in your deck.
Bascarite Vermin has +1 ATK for each other Bascarite Vermin in this rank.

name: Battle Ring
effect: This character is also a fighter.
"So the Stormknights think they can take my forest? It is time they learned respect." - Tepheroth

name: Belt of Champions
effect:
Unique
+2 Skill
This card may only be equipped by your Warlord.
Order: Once per turn, this character selects a class. He or she is considered to be of that class in addition to his or her original class until the end of the turn.

name: Belt of Corruption
effect:
Belt • Cursed
May not be targeted by opposing characters while equipped to Atu the Fallen.
Order: Spend Belt: Search your deck for a Level 5 or lower Monster or Undead and put it into play in any rank in your formation.
React: Once per turn, before this cleric suffers wounds, inflict the same number of wounds on a Monster or Undead: Reduce this cleric's wounds to zero.

name: Beradah Dythanus
effect:
Elf • Overlord • Undead • Necromancer • Scribe +6
React: After Beradah inflicts one or more wounds on a character with a spell: Target all characters in the rank of the spell's target. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or become spent. Stun any targets who fail and were already spent.

name: Bescez
effect:
Elf • Stealth +10
Bescez enters play in the rank behind an opponent's last occupied rank.
When Bescez Maneuvers, it is considered a Stealth action.
If Bescez is in your army, your Warlord gains the ability: "Order: Once per turn: Move an opposing character forward or backward one rank."

name: Black Banner Cohort
effect:
Mercenary • Epic • Barbarian • Cohort
Whenever Black Banner Cohort would be killed by a card effect, he is wounded instead.
React: After Black Banner Cohort performs a melee strike that killed the target: If Kovit Treeraiser is your Warlord, Black Banner Cohort gains +2 HP and +5 ATK permanently.

name: Black Petre
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Search your deck for a non-unique item, show it to the other players, and put it in your hand. You may only perform this action if Christophe Kringle is your Warlord.
Beside him sat Black Petre, a cranky old elf; I ran for my life, in spite of myself.

name: Black Sun Helm (Treasure)
effect:
Helm • Treasure • 1250 gp

name: Black Wyrm Helm
effect:
Helm • Unique

name: Black Wyrm's Egg
effect:
Unique
React: Spend the egg after this character inflicts one or more wounds with a melee strike. Reduce the target's AC by 3 permanently, and discard one item equipped by the target.

name: Black Wyrm's Egg (Tooth and Claw Era Promo)
effect:
Level 7-Classless Unique 
React: Spend the egg after this character inflicts one or more wounds with a melee strike. Reduce the targets AC by 3 permanently, and discard one item equipped by the target.

name: Blackblade

Weapon • Magic Resistance +9 • Riposte +9

This character's ATK, AC, Level, Skill, and hit points may not be reduced.
This character's Critical Failures are considered Critical Successes.

name: Blackstone Spaulders
effect:
Armor

name: Blade Dancer
effect:
Mercenary • Reindeer • Monster
May not equip items.

To the city streets they fly, surmount its stone walls. Now wipe them out, wipe them out, slay one and all.

name: Blade Hag
effect:
Mercenary
May only equip Weapons.
May equip four Weapons.
Blade Hag gains +3 ATK and AC for each equipped Weapon.
Blade Hag gains Powerattack +10 and Riposte +10 if she has three or more Weapons equipped.
Blade Hag gains +2 HP and Levels if she has four Weapons equipped.

name: Blade of Syneri (Treasure)
effect:
Epic • Weapon • Treasure • 25000 gp
+1 HP
Mercenary only.
This character has an additional melee strike (base his primary ATK) when he attacks.

name: Blade of Torment
effect:
Weapon • Riposte +5

Mercenary • Epic • Seer • Cohort

name: Blessed Edge
effect:
Epic
Your fighters permanently gain the Paladin trait.
"Thou hast helped me in the past, yet there are still enemies on the field; I hunger, and your sacrifice shall help me tear them asunder!"

name: Blessings of Granite
effect:
Earth
Order: Until end of turn, target character gains +3 ATK, +1 HP, Powerattack +6, and if this cleric is a Gargoyle, +3 AC.

name: Blinding Beauty
effect:
Nymph only.

name: Blitzer
effect:
Mercenary • Unique • Monster
Blitzer may not equip items.

Faster than falcons to his summons they came. He shouted to the demons and called their true names:

effect: React: After this character equips an item: Attach this card to the character. While Blood Oath is attached, characters performing an action targeting any items on this character must discard a card as an additional cost for the action.

name: Blood Worm
effect:
Mercenary • Monster

Helm • Unique

effect:
Unique

Treasure

+1 AC

effect: React: After equipping Bounty, target an opposing non-Warlord character. While Bounty is equipped, this character has a +10 bonus to all rolls for actions and strikes against the target, and for all checks and saves caused by the target.

name: Bracers of the Fey
effect:
Treasure • 2250 gp

Mercenary • Epic • Cohort

name: Builder Cohort
effect:
Mercenary • Epic • Cohort • 1 Charge

effect: React: Before using an action card: This character is +1 level for performing the action.

effect:
Warlord only.

name: Cairn Rowan
effect:
Dwarf/Elf • Ranger • Stealth +6

Order: Once per turn, spend a character. If you spent a wizard, Warlord, or Hero, you may move Cairn forward or backward one rank. If you spent a cleric, Warlord, or Hero, ready Cairn.

name: Cal Blackborne
effect:
Mercenary

name: Calenar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Siege • Unique

effect:
Mercenary • Epic • Cohort

name: Call of the Wild
effect:
Cleric and fighter only.
Order: Reveal the top 10 cards from your deck. You may put a character (two characters if this character is a Barbarian, Druid, or Ranger) revealed into play adjacent to this character, even if it causes an illegal rank. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.

name: Calling the Storm
effect: Order: Discard up to three cards: Kill all non-Warlord characters with Level equal to the number of cards discarded.

name: Canis
effect:
If Canis is in play at the start of the game, your deck may consist of more than 50% of one card type.
If Canis is in play at the start of the game, you begin with 3rd level characters in place of first level characters and 5th level characters in place of 2nd level characters.

name: Cassica Moonseed
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Medusan Lord • Summoner

Unique

Challenge Rating 10

effect:
Elf • Warlord • Scout

Elf • Medusan Lord • Assassin • Unique

name: Cei

Mercenary

Helm
